means: 16世纪意大利艺术，该时期意大利艺术风格

sentence.Network_en: The remaining great painters of the High Renaissance all lived their active careers in the Cinquecento.
sentence.Network_cn: 文艺复兴盛期其他的伟大画家们全都以意大利艺术和文学的十六世纪为活跃期.

sentence.Network_en: They [ Harvard ] are trying to sell a Hummer when everyone wants a Fiat Cinquecento.
sentence.Network_cn: “当所有人都想要一辆菲亚特500(FiatCinquecento) 的时候,他们 ( 哈佛 ) 却在设法销售悍马(Hummer)”.

PerfectNetExp.abs: cinquecentist 意文艺家cinquecento 意大利艺术cinquedea 五指剑
cinquanta 钦宽塔, cinquecento 16世纪意大利艺术, cinque 桑克

derivation.yuyuan_name: Italian, literally 500' (shortened from milcinquecento '1500') used with reference to the years 1500–99
